column4: After installing GeForce 6200 drivers my firefox is blank and almost all the windows are blank no adddress bars no buttons nothing. Can someone tell me what to do?
After installing GeForce 6200 drivers my firefox is blank and almost all the windows are blank no adddress bars no buttons nothing. Can someone tell me what to do?
can you turn off some visual effects?
yes, I installed the current Nvidia drivers
you don't have compiz installed or anything fancy already do you?
nope, and I do not see visual effects in Appearance
I just installed Ubuntu like 1 hour ago
ok. You restarted after the install? (i know, but had to ask)
I did restart it twice, but still the problem persists.
gedit is blank, firefox is blank, kate is blank . It is crazy.
tell me what to do
go to additional drivers
is that the only way?
ok, stay with me
Now I am removing the driver
what version of the 6200 do you have?
I uninstalled it. Now what?
I have GeForce 6200 and I already had tried reinstalling it and it again had the same problem
are you on 32 bit or 64 bit
64 bit
you don't have a geforce 6200 Le
no
Ok, I am downloading the file
no
